This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

Get the fast-paced Reinhard Staupe’s BLINK card game in an exclusive tin. Blink is a fast-moving one-on-one card game that involves counting, shapes and colors. This tin makes a great addition to any game cupboard and helps to keep all your cards neat and organized! ready Ages 7 years and up. Colors and decorations may vary.
This exclusive tin comes with Reinhard Staupe’s fast-moving BLINK Card Game.
BLINK Card Game is a perfect choice for kid, teen or adult game night. Blink is a challenging game for 2 opponents with intense one-on-one play.
The Blink game features lightning-fast action by two players racing head-to-head to be the first to play all of their cards by matching the shape, count or color on the cards.
This sturdy tin makes card storage easy and makes a great gift for 7 year olds and up. Includes one card deck and instructions in a collectable storage tin.

Read more

Read more

Deal Out Fun on Game Night!

For 70 years, Mattel Games has been bringing family and friends together to play. Whatever your preference — matching, counting, speed or strategy — fun is always at hand with a Mattel Card Game.

From the brand

WHO WE ARE ?

Mythinglogic was founded in 1999, and is committed to become the most helpful brand in garage storage solution area, aiming to enable an easy garage organizing experience.

WHAT WE DO ?

We offer a wide range of products including all kinds of sports equipment storage racks ,golf storage racks, yoga storage racks as well as tool storage racks.

CLICK TO STORE

CLICK TO STORE

CLICK TO STORE

HOME GYM STORAGE RACK

SPORTS EQUIPMENT STORGE

GOLF GEAR STORGE RACK

GARDEN TOOL RACK

WALL MOUNT SPORTS RACK

SPECIAL DESIGN SPORTS STORAGE ORGANIZER : This sports gear storage stand is an upgraded version for garage storage.It combines a ball storage with golf bag organizer. And it has 4 extra shelves and basket, which can be used to store sports accessories, fitness or tools for your garage.
MULTIFUNCTIONAL STORAGE: This sports rack organizer features with 6 Baseball bat rack,6 movable hanging hooks and 5 bat holder on the side. All those storage accessories can help to store your sports bat , helmet and sports accessories. Make your garage tidy and well organized.
ELASTIC STRAPS DESIGN: This ball rack gets 5 elastic straps. This unique design maximizes storage space of the ball storage bin and allows easier access to the items at the bottom.
HEAVY DUTY STEEL MATERIAL: The ball storage rack is made of high quality steel with powder coated finish and very strong.Since the height is tall and weight is heavy ,for your safety, please install it with screws on the wall.
DIMENSIONS: Overall product size of this sports organizer is 62.0″ L x 13.0″ W x 65.7″ H. And size of the Golf bag stand is 24’’L x 15.7’’W x 48’’H which can hold up to 2 standard golf bags.

It is an attractive, functional storage rack that fits into the garage.And it holds clubs (full bags), and a host of balls, all kind of sports gear, shoes and tools on the five racks. The rack tubing is finished on all ends ,so no jagged ends to scratch things.And the fully assembled unit is very sturdy. And this garage storage shelves is designed for organizing golf equipment and all kind of sports equipment. All-in-one sports storage racks for your garage.

WHAT’S IN PACKAGE:

1 x Sports storage rack

(Assemble required)

1 x Instruction Manual

1 x Some hardware

Read more

PRODUCT DETAILS:

BAT RACK

This sports equipment storage rack features 5 bat holder, can hold baseball bat or Rugby stick or golf stick firmly.

MOVABALE HOOKS

There are some moveable hooks,as you can place any places on sides,so that they create space for hanging lots of different items like coat, hat, lifejacket,bags,sport shoes,etc.

BASEBALL BAT RACK

This sport equipment storage rack equipped with bat rack which can hold 2 baseball rack. Will protect your essential items and lock it firmly in place.

ELASTIC STRAPS

This ball bins gets some elastic straps. This unique design maximizes storage space and allows easier access to the items at the bottom.

Each deck offers unique game play for a different experience:The UNO Card Game is about color and number matching, the Phase ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $16.99 - $15.20
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:22:44 UTC – Details)



In this exclusive tin full of fun, card lovers will find 3 exciting games from Mattel -the UNO Card Game, Phase 10 Card Game and ONO 99 Card Game. Each deck offers unique game play for a different experience:
The UNO Card Game is about color and number matching, the Phase 10 Card Game involves creating card series rummy-style and the ONO 99 Card Game challenges players to add cards up without hitting 99!
The 3 card games test a range of skills and let players either focus on one game or mix it up for a full night of friendly competition!
The decorative tin keeps the card decks and instructions neatly stored away when not in play.
Makes a great gift for houses that host kid, teen, adult or family game nights.

5

Product Description

Power Tool Organizer

3 Quick and Easy Ways This Power Tool Orangizer Wall Mount Will Save Money, Time and Make You Money Even If Your Already the Best Tradesperson in the world!!

STOP WASTING MONEY: Made from ultra durable SPCC cold rolled steel, this power tool organizer is designed by professionals and is built to last which means you wont be wasting your hard earned money on fragile timber tool organizers!SAVE TIME: This power tool storage rack features 5 slots to hold cordless power tools, and 2 open shelves to keep your tools organized in one central location. No more wasting time looking through drawers , toolboxes and random places for your tools again which means you will have time to sit down and watch the game or spend more time with the kids!MAKE MORE MONEY: Holds up to 14 jobber drill bits starting form 1/16” to ½” and dedicated storage for screwdrivers and hand tools which means you’ll locate your tools quickly and complete projects fast so you can get to your next customer/client!

WARNING : Do Not Even Consider Buying Another Power Tool Organizer Until You Read This:

HAPPY WIFE , HAPPY LIFE: Having your tools organized and ready to go at a moments notice for any project will allow you to complete those honey-do list jobs that you’ve been getting bugged about for months which means you will be in the good books and not the dog house!INCREDIBLE SUPPORT: Each exclusive tool storage shelf can support up to 66 pounds which means you’ll feel safe that your load and tools will always be supported!PROTECTION AGAINST DAMAGE: Featuring a high-quality powder-coated finish which helps you protect against damage and is easy to wipe clean !

The Perfect Solution If You Want To Look Like A Professional Tradesperson Even If You Are Just A Avid Do-It-Yourself’er :

ALL THE GEAR BUT NO IDEA ? : These heavy-duty tool organizers and storage drill rack features colors to match your favorite power tool brands which means even if your not a professional tradesperson you can look like one!STRESS FREE INSTALLATION: This garage storage rack is so quick and easy to assemble even the most amateur DIY’ers can do it with ease! Fewer screws are needed compared to other ordinary timber power tool holders and also comes with wall mounting hardware which means no more pulling your hair out over stripped nuts!WHAT’S INCLUDED:(1) x Steel Tool OrganizerAssembly HardwareWall Mounting HardwareAssembly Instructions

Steel
TOOLGANIZE YOUR GARAGE: Enjoy unsurpassed shop organization with the Toolganize Power Tool Storage Organizer. Keep all of your tools organized in one central location which means you’ll never be wasting time looking for your tools again!
DESIGNED BY TRADESMEN , BUILT FOR STRENGTH : Made from powder-coated SPCC cold rolled steel for heavy duty strength and durability, this wall tool organizer is designed by professionals to last which means you wont be wasting your money on fragile timber tool organizers!
ROOM FOR ALL YOUR TOOLS: This garage tool organizer has 2 solid shelves, 5 drill holder slots for cordless power tools, holds 14 jobber drill bits starting form 1/16” to ½”, and dedicated storage for screwdrivers and hand tools Which means you’ll locate your tools quickly and get your jobs done faster!
FLAT PACKED & EASY TO ASSEMBLE: This garage storage rack is quick and easy to assemble! The garage tool organizer wall mount needs fewer screws than ordinary timber power tool holders and also comes with wall mounting hardware which means no more pulling your hair out over stripped nuts!
ALL THE GEAR AND NO IDEA?: These heavy-duty tool organizers and storage drill racks features colors to match your favorite power tool brands which means even if your not a professional tradesperson you can look like one!

From the brand

TCL 30 SE

Revolutionary Viewing

TCL 30XL

Elevate Your Vision

TCL 30 5G

Maximize Your Entertainment

TCL enjoy more

6.53” FHD+ Dotch LCD display: Powered by NXTVISION, will upgrade your visual experience with the sharper details, vibrant images and allow you to enjoy true-to-life color accuracy in everything you present.TCL 10L Unlocked Android Smartphone is made for the US with a one-year US warranty.
Superior clarity day & night: Coming with a 48MP high-res AI camera(48MP+8MP+2MP+2MP) and 6MP front-facing selfie camera, TCL 10L android phone helps you capture crisp and vivid pictures. The AI-powered camera recognizes and enhances scenes & objects for your best creations.
Compatible with GSM carriers(AT&T and T-Mobile). TCL 10L mobile phone is also certified for use on Verizon’s LTE network. If your device is not receiving messages or experiences an error when making phone calls on Verizon, your account may need to be provisioned to support “CDMA-less” devices, please contact Verizon’s technical support team or your account’s business representative for assistance. This phone is not compatible with CDMA networks. (such as Sprint, Spectrum, Xfinity, etc.)
Comfortable viewing all day: Auto-adjusting display provides the best viewing experience regardless of lighting conditions. A 4000mAh battery and Intelligent Battery Mode optimize power usage to keep you cord-free all day. Please know that on TCL 10L phone WIFI calling is only compatible with T-Mobile.

Superior Clarity

TCL 10L unlocked android smartphone capture the moment like never before with an AI quad camera system that integrates auto-brightness, super resolution, HDR & more. There are vibrant pixels in every shot, day or night. Experience 3 times more brightness and capture greater detail even in the darkest of settings.

Greater View

With the TCL 10L android phone you can find the beauty in little things with a Macro Camera that captures the rich textures, and tiny details of all your favorite things.

Full-Scene Photos

TCL 10L’s 118° wide-angle camera includes 3.3 times more of the world in a single shot. Gather your friends for a beautiful sunset and take an unforgettable photo or video – with everyone in it. Snap a breathtaking landscape and be able to capture the entirety of the beauty around you.

Imaginative Video

With the TCL 10L, you can set up shortcut keys in an instant. Get maximum control so you will know exactly what’s happening on your screen and what you’re touching, making life more convenient and effortless for you.

Read more

Smart Key for Fast Access

The Smart Key allows you to customize your TCL 10L mobile phone to access any dedicated app or feature with the press of a button. Make your phone as unique as you.

Effortless Unlocking

Never worry about your phone getting into the wrong hands again. With the convenience and security of two forms of authentication (Face Key and a fingerprint sensor), you get safe and fast access to your cell phone. One simple touch or glance will bring you straight to your favorite apps or important messages.

Powerful Audio

Enjoy a seamlessly connected lifestyle by connecting up to four speakers or headphones at once. Bring the party to life and share your favorite playlist on the go with a personalized listening experience.

Talkback Blind Mode

Optimized Power A 4000mAh battery and Intelligent Battery Mode optimize power usage to keep you cord-free all day.

Network

Compatible with GSM carriers, including AT&T and T-Mobile. TCL 10L unlocked smartphone is also certified for use on Verizon’s LTE network. If your device is not receiving messages or experiences an error when making phone calls on Verizon, your account may need to be provisioned to support “CDMA-less” devices, please contact Verizon’s team or your account’s business representative for assistance. This phone is not compatible with CDMA networks. (such as Sprint, Spectrum, Xfinity, etc.)

TCL 10L – NXTVISION Display

Optimize your media playback and creative expression with TCL 10L’s NXTVISION visual technology. Experience streaming in a whole new way thanks to an expansive 6.53” FHD+ NXTVISION display with a dedicated display engine that enhances color, clarity and contrast in real time. HDR feature improves ordinary videos so you can enjoy sharp, remastered HDR content no matter the source. Plus, browse and read comfortably with an array of eye protection modes.

Capture greatness with the NXTVISION 48MP AI-powered quad rear camera and 16MP front camera. The quad camera consists of a 48MP high resolution camera, a super wide-angle camera, a macro camera and a depth camera for amazing portraits. Create fun and artistic clips with wide angle and stop motion video modes.

Make life on the go a little easier with a powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon 665 octa-core processor, and a reliable 4000mAh battery with smart power optimization. Tap-and-go with a customizable interface, Smart Key, Face Key and fingerprint sensor that provide access effortlessly.

From the brand

DaFang is committed to developing and designing organizer and storage clean tools products, included broom rack and mop holder. Save your home space and make your life more easy.

IMILLET Broom Organizer

Tidy Your Home: 5 ball slots and 6 hooks design, organize your annoying cleaning tools within small space.
Spring Loaded: Special spring clips design with rolling rubber ball that make sure the broom and mop will not fall out,including wet mop, dirty rakes, stick vacuum and other heavy stuff
Wide Compatible To Everywhere: Apply to your garage, garden, kitchen, laundry, offices and more. It is strong and sturdy. Keep solid on the wall with the slots and screws (Included). It can organize most of tools of your home.
Heavy Duty: Mop holder grip everything tightly and securely. Each rolling ball holds up to 6.5 pounds of weight(smooth rod is up to 3 pounds), holder can hold up to about 11 tools in total. Made of high quality ABS and slots and screws.We upgraded our products after 2018 July 1st, and we improved the quality of this products that are easy-to-drop. Now the products can grip everything tightly and securely.
Easy Install: Wall mounted, detailed installation steps on the package. Easy to install with slots and screws (included).

  • There are 5 ball slots and 6 hooks so you can organize as much cleaning utilities, organizer designed to hold various household objects with handles of varying thickness, Hooks can be folded up and out of the way.
  • Simply insert a handle into a slot and a rounded, spring loaded, rolling ball automatically adjusts to the handle’s thickness and grips it securely, Easy release by lifting the handle.
  • Fast and Easy to install, 6 screws to hold the wall mount organizer to ensure strong and sturdy holding. Each rolling ball holds up to 6.5 pounds of weight(smooth rod is up to 3 pounds), holder can hold up to about 11 tools in total.

Read more

Weight:350g*2

Size:16.75*2.36*3.15in

Please attention:It is not suitable for the big handle of garden tools

Package Included:

  • 2 X Wall Mount Broom Holder
  • 12 X Screws
  • 12 X Screw Cover

Upgrade Broom Rack

The new broom holder allows for the handle to slide in from the front and is held tight in place.Just use one hand to put broom in holder,even the kids also can do it,easy to use.

Space Saver

Imillet broom holder can keep your broom, closet, kitchen, garage, garden, bathroom, or laundry room in organized. Also suitable for garden and yard tools racks storage and organize.

5 Slots 6 Hooks

5 postions can hold up mop, broom, dustpan, shovel, small vacuum, small garden tools and others.6 foldable hooks are great for rags, bristle brushes, swifters, fly swatter and other small tools.

item.title: FLOCK THREE Hanging Car Trash Bag Foldable Fun Sturdy Trash Container Storage Waterproof Car Trash Bin with Velkro Cute Grocery Organizer Bag for Automotive Front Seat Headrest Trash Can (Dog Family)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) WATERPROOF AND REUSABLE: FLOCK THREE car trash bag is made from water-resistant TPU. It is reusable, double layered (both inner and outer) and BPA-free. It is durable with high-quality finishing. It is also machine washable and can be put in dryer.HOW TO USE THE BAG: Align the bottom edge. Stick ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $13.39
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:42:59 UTC – Details)



WATERPROOF AND REUSABLE: FLOCK THREE car trash bag is made from water-resistant TPU. It is reusable, double layered (both inner and outer) and BPA-free. It is durable with high-quality finishing. It is also machine washable and can be put in dryer.
HOW TO USE THE BAG: Align the bottom edge. Stick the tape fastener bars together. Fold the edge at least 4 times up and snap the buttons together. It can be adjusted to 3 different sizes to suit your needs.
DRAWSTRING TOP AND TAPE FASTENER BOTTOM: The top drawstring is made from nylon rope. You can easily adjust the opening size of the bag with the drawstring to dispose the garbage. The bottom of this bag is stitched left and right with two pieces of tape fastener bars. The tape fastener bottom makes emptying a breeze. Easy to clean and empty.
SNAP BUTTON STRAP: This car trash bag has a handle strap on top of the holder for you to hang them anywhere you like! There are two snap buttons on the strap. The strap is adjustable and allows you to hang it up or take it down hassle-free. The sturdy handle can be easily hung on car seat, armrest, headrest or anywhere inside your car or any other places that you deem fit.
MULTI-FUNCTIONAL BAG: This car trash bag is the perfect solution to keep and organise your used plastic grocery bags. It also could also be used to store undergarments, socks, baby washcloths and bibs. It is the best solution for space saving. You can hang it anywhere in the kitchen, bedroom, storeroom or workshop.

4.5
Price: $13.39
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:42:59 UTC – Details)
